{"id":302392843,"lang":"python","time":"2 years, 2 months","timestamp":1581446510,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/302392843/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"12.1 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def lengthOfLongestSubstring(self, s):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type s: str\n        :rtype: int\n        \"\"\"\n        max_len = 0\n        curr_len = 0\n        hash_map = {}\n        \n        for idx, letter in enumerate(s):\n            if letter not in hash_map:\n                hash_map[letter] = idx\n                curr_len += 1\n            else:\n                if curr_len > max_len:\n                    max_len = curr_len\n                if (idx - hash_map[letter] <= curr_len):\n                    curr_len = idx - hash_map[letter]\n                else: \n                    curr_len += 1\n                hash_map[letter] = idx\n        if curr_len > max_len:\n            return curr_len\n        else:\n            return max_len\n            \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
